sentiments.answer: Visit your nearest Aadhaar Seva Kendra or apply online at uidai.gov.in.

sentiments.question: how to file an RTI
sentiments.answer: You can file an RTI online at rtionline.gov.in or submit a handwritten application to the concerned department.

sentiments.question: what is ayushman bharat scheme
sentiments.answer: Ayushman Bharat provides free health coverage up to ₹5 lakh per family per year.

sentiments.answer: As of 2024, the President of India is Droupadi Murmu.

sentiments.question: where is vijayawada located?
sentiments.answer: Vijayawada is a city located in the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is situated approximately 200 kilometers (124 miles) north of the state capital, Amaravati, and about 150 kilometers (93 miles) south of the city of Visakhapatnam. Vijayawada is a significant urban center in the region, known for its historical land
